property.name: strWhere
property.value: (MAIN.NOTIF_CLOSING_ID is NULL) AND (MAIN.COMPANY_ID in (SELECT USER_COMPANY.COMPANY_ID FROM USER_COMPANY WHERE USER_COMPANY.USER_ID = %CURRENTUSERID%))

property.name: strWhere
property.value: (MAIN.COMPANY_ID in (SELECT USER_COMPANY.COMPANY_ID FROM USER_COMPANY WHERE USER_COMPANY.USER_ID = %CURRENTUSERID%))
